collection:
This Privacy Policy explains how
we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our
GPT.

## No Data Collection

SmartKart does not collect or store any personal data from its users.

We do
not require users to provide any personal information to use our service, and
we do not track user activities, store user data, or share information with
third parties.

These services are responsible for their own data collection
and usage practices, and we recommend reviewing their privacy policies for
more information.
